hero.headline: Immaculata High School
hero.subheadline: Where Faith, Scholarship, Service, and Friendship Unite

news.title: Taylor Thiele Wins 2nd Consecutive Skyland Conference Wrestling Championship
news.summary: Senior Taylor Thiele makes history with back-to-back championship wins, leading the Spartans wrestling program to new heights.

news.title: Mrs. Kristin Camiolo Receives Prestigious Lux Dei Award
news.summary: Mathematics teacher Mrs. Camiolo honored for her outstanding dedication to Catholic education and student excellence.

news.title: Football Program Welcomes New Leadership for 2026
news.summary: Jeff Vanderbeek and Dallas Whitaker step into leadership roles, bringing fresh energy to Spartan football.

news.title: Jack Cust Jr. Inducted into NJSIAA Hall of Fame 2026
news.summary: Former Spartan standout receives highest honor in New Jersey high school athletics.

news.title: Wrestling Team Captures Somerset County Title
news.summary: Historic victory as Spartans wrestling makes county championship history with dominant performance.

news.title: Cheer Squad Wins Garden State Challenge Division Championship
news.summary: Spartan cheerleaders bring home gold with spectacular performance at state competition.

academics.title: Academic Excellence
academics.description: Immaculata High School offers a comprehensive curriculum designed to prepare students for success in college and beyond.

admissions.title: Join the Spartan Family
admissions.description: Discover how Immaculata High School can be the foundation for your child's bright future.

testimonials.text: Immaculata gave me the foundation I needed not just academically, but spiritually and socially. The teachers truly care about each student's success.
testimonials.author: Sarah M., Class of 2023

testimonials.text: The sense of community at Immaculata is unmatched. I made lifelong friendships and learned values that guide me every day.
testimonials.author: Michael R., Class of 2022

testimonials.text: The college preparation program helped me get into my dream school. The guidance counselors were incredible throughout the process.
testimonials.author: Emma L., Class of 2024

athletics.title: Spartan Athletics
athletics.description: Building champions on and off the field through dedication, teamwork, and Spartan pride.

spotlight.name: Mrs. Kristin Camiolo
spotlight.title: Mathematics Teacher
spotlight.description: Dedicated educator with over 15 years of experience inspiring students in mathematics and fostering academic excellence.

events.title: Open House
events.description: Tour our campus and meet our faculty and students

events.title: Spring Sports Registration
events.description: Register for spring sports programs and meet coaches

events.title: Academic Awards Night
events.description: Recognizing academic excellence and scholarship recipients

contact.principalMessage: Welcome to Immaculata High School, where we are committed to developing the whole person - mind, body, and spirit. Our dedicated faculty and staff work tirelessly to provide an environment where students can grow academically, spiritually, and socially.
